sorcer.util

Class JavaSystemProperties

  • java.lang.Object
    • sorcer.util.JavaSystemProperties

  • public class JavaSystemProperties
extends Object
    Helper class for accessing system properties. Allows to use Properties or Map object, or the System properties if the former is not provided.
    Author:
    Rafał Krupiński

      Get the property from map or from system properties.
      static String getProperty(String key, String defaultValue, Map<String,String> properties)
      Get the property from map or, if map is null, from the system properties.
      static String getProperty(String key, String defaultValue, Properties properties)
      Get the property from Properties object or, if it's null, from the system properties.

    • Method Detail

      • getProperty

        public static String getProperty(String key,
                 Map<String,String> properties)
        Get the property from map or from system properties.
        Parameters:
        key - property key
        properties - map od properties, use system properties if null
        Returns:
        property value

      • getProperty

        public static String getProperty(String key,
                 String defaultValue,
                 Properties properties)
        Get the property from Properties object or, if it's null, from the system properties.
        Parameters:
        key - property key
        defaultValue - default value returned if property is not defined
        properties - properties to search they key in. If null, the system properties are used
        Returns:
        property value or default value if the property is not defined

      • getProperty

        public static String getProperty(String key,
                 String defaultValue,
                 Map<String,String> properties)
        Get the property from map or, if map is null, from the system properties.
        Parameters:
        key - property key
        defaultValue - default value returned if property is not defined
        properties - Map to search they key in. If null, the system properties are used
        Returns:
        property value or default value if the property is not defined
